abstract_ssm: The collection consists of one linear foot of black-and-white and color photographic negatives dating from 1914 to 1983, with the bulk dating from approximately 1940 to 1970.  Subjects of the negatives include Watson, his family and friends, and buildings and scenes viewed during his extensive travels in Europe and the United States.
geogname_ssm: United States -- Armed Forces -- World War, 1939-1945

place_sim: United States -- Armed Forces -- World War, 1939-1945
